items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vanilla

*   [vite-tinybase (⭐10)](https://github.com/tinyplex/vite-tinybase) - Starter template for TinyBase.
*   [vite-tinybase-ts (⭐11)](https://github.com/tinyplex/vite-tinybase-ts) - Starter template for TinyBase and TypeScript.

### Templates / React

*   [vite-tinybase-react (⭐6)](https://github.com/tinyplex/vite-tinybase-react) - Starter template for TinyBase and React.
*   [vite-tinybase-ts-react (⭐12)](https://github.com/tinyplex/vite-tinybase-ts-react) - Starter template for TinyBase, TypeScript, and React.
items.content_html:
Templates / Vanilla

  • vite-tinybase (⭐10) - Starter template for TinyBase.
  • vite-tinybase-ts (⭐11) - Starter template for TinyBase and TypeScript.

Templates / React

  • vite-tinybase-react (⭐6) - Starter template for TinyBase and React.
  • vite-tinybase-ts-react (⭐12) - Starter template for TinyBase, TypeScript, and React.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [autoupdate-oh-my-zsh-plugins (⭐288)](https://github.com/TamCore/autoupdate-oh-my-zsh-plugins) - [oh-my-zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/) doesn't automatically update non-core plugins, this plugin autoupdates `git` repositories in the `$ZSH_CUSTOM` directory.
*   [projen (⭐0)](https://github.com/p6m7g8/p6-zsh-projen-plugin) - Adds aliases for [projen (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/projen/projen).
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • autoupdate-oh-my-zsh-plugins (⭐288) - oh-my-zsh doesn't automatically update non-core plugins, this plugin autoupdates git repositories in the $ZSH_CUSTOM directory.
  • projen (⭐0) - Adds aliases for projen (⭐2.8k).

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### GTFS Libraries / Python

*   [gtfs-segments (⭐43)](https://github.com/UTEL-UIUC/gtfs_segments) - Python package that represents GTFS data for buses in a concise tabular manner using segments.

### GTFS Analysis Tools / Rust

*   [GTFS Kit (⭐81)](https://github.com/mrcagney/gtfs_kit) - A Python 3.6+ tool kit for analyzing General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) data. Supersedes [GTFSTK](https://github.com/araichev/gtfstk).

### GTFS Timetable Publishing Tools / Rust

*   [GTFS-to-HTML](https://gtfstohtml.com) - Generate human-readable timetables in HTML or PDF format directly from GTFS.
*   [Timetable Kit (⭐44)](https://github.com/neroden/timetable_kit) - An open source Python 3.10 module and scripts depending on [GTFS Kit (⭐81)](https://github.com/mrcagney/gtfs_kit), designed to create complex printed/PDF timetables with flexible layouts. Currently only working out of the box for Amtrak's GTFS, but under active development.
items.content_html:
GTFS Libraries / Python

  • gtfs-segments (⭐43) - Python package that represents GTFS data for buses in a concise tabular manner using segments.

GTFS Analysis Tools / Rust

  • GTFS Kit (⭐81) - A Python 3.6+ tool kit for analyzing General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) data. Supersedes GTFSTK.

GTFS Timetable Publishing Tools / Rust

  • GTFS-to-HTML - Generate human-readable timetables in HTML or PDF format directly from GTFS.
  • Timetable Kit (⭐44) - An open source Python 3.10 module and scripts depending on GTFS Kit (⭐81), designed to create complex printed/PDF timetables with flexible layouts. Currently only working out of the box for Amtrak's GTFS, but under active development.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [vue-global-alert-utility (⭐0)](https://github.com/RashadSaleh/vue-global-alert-utility) - A Vue.js global alert utility to replace vanilla JavaScript `alert` function with better user and developer experience, while keeping it as simple as possible.
*   [Everright-filter (⭐100)](https://github.com/Liberty-liu/Everright-filter) - A query builder component for Vue3. Supports filtering of multiple data types, including string, number, dropdown, cascade, region, date, and time.

### Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

*   [vrf (⭐9)](https://github.com/dimailn/vrf) - Declarative scalable ui-agnostic markup-based Vue forms.
*   [vueginate (⭐8)](https://github.com/lombervid/vueginate) - A simple pagination component for Vue 3
*   [blottie (⭐13)](https://github.com/Applelo/blottie) Lottie component for Vue 3
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / UI Components

  • vue-global-alert-utility (⭐0) - A Vue.js global alert utility to replace vanilla JavaScript alert function with better user and developer experience, while keeping it as simple as possible.
  • Everright-filter (⭐100) - A query builder component for Vue3. Supports filtering of multiple data types, including string, number, dropdown, cascade, region, date, and time.

Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

  • vrf (⭐9) - Declarative scalable ui-agnostic markup-based Vue forms.
  • vueginate (⭐8) - A simple pagination component for Vue 3
  • blottie (⭐13) Lottie component for Vue 3

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Resources / Learning

*   [Building a Rust service with Nix](https://fasterthanli.me/series/building-a-rust-service-with-nix) - An in-depth blog series about creating a Rust application with Nix.
*   [Nix Shorts (⭐23)](https://github.com/alper/nix-shorts) - A collection of short notes about how to use Nix, updated for Nix Flakes.
items.content_html:
Resources / Learning

  • Building a Rust service with Nix - An in-depth blog series about creating a Rust application with Nix.
  • Nix Shorts (⭐23) - A collection of short notes about how to use Nix, updated for Nix Flakes.
